about_the_game:
Just as one bad apple spoils the bunch, the wrong equipment can spell doom for a heister on the job. To prevent such pitfalls, the Syntax Error Weapon Pack provides you with 3 brand new weapons to help beef up your arsenal.

This pack contains the following:
  • SMG - 'WAR-45': High Power, Lower fire rate
  • Shotgun - 'FSA-12G': medium power, high fire rate, semi auto, magazine loaded
  • Marksman - 'FIK 22 TLR': low power, high fire rate, very accurate
  • Weapon Charm - 'Whistleblower'
  • Weapon Sticker - 'BSOD'

content_descriptors.notes: PAYDAY 3 contains repeated displays of gun violence, including the shooting of civilians and law enforcement. PAYDAY 3 references alcohol and tobacco as well as illegal drugs in a lighthearted way.
